entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM does not support nested structs with explicit layout #61385
  • [API Proposal]: Add a "You can ignore the return value safely" attribute #61382
  • .NET Standard 2.1 vs .NET 6 Threading in Blazor WASM #61381
  • Source build leg is timing out in official build #61378
  • Use of JsonSerializerContext Can Cause CS1591 #61379
  • Blazor WASM AOT .NET 6 performance degradation on Safari, iPhone 6, iOS 15.1 #61373
  • Unregistering grouped delegates does nothing. #61369
  • [wasm] Implement ValueTask marshaling #61368
    7.0.0
  • [.NET 6] UriBuilder breaking change not documented #61363
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CertificateCreation.CertificateRequestChainTests.CreateChain_RSAPSS failed on rolling builds #61362
  • Creating a PKCS7 signature from the result of RSACng.SignHash(..) with dotnet tools #61360
    Future
  • Regression in multiple benchmarks from value numbering #61375
  • System.Runtime.Extensions.Tests: Assertion failed #61359
  • [Proposal] SqlBulkCopy : Improve exception that is thrown when value conversion fails #61356
  • EventCounters unexpectedly stop reporting data when first of two listeners disconnects #61353
    7.0.0
  • wasm aot compilation failed for BlazorFluentUI.CoreComponents #61352
  • [API Proposal]: Posix error codes #61351
  • [Mono] Fix android rolling build failures #61343
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Test AOT builds failing due to OOM #61339
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Arrays\\lcs\\_rellcsval\\_rellcsval.cmd #61338
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V2.0-RTM/b487364/b487364/b487364.sh #61337

Closed

  • HTTP/3: Unit test variable length encoding #51519
    7.0.0
  • Request CachePolicy isn't applied in HTTP request header #31320
    Future
  • Algorithm `xml-exc-c14n` not implemented? #61361
  • TimeSeparator has changed from : to . for da-DK in .NET 5+ #61380
  • Do not discard results of methods marked as pure #34098
    Future
  • [Proposal] IImmutableSet<T>.Union should handle duplicates like ISet<T>.UnionWith #14686
    Future
  • Improve ConcurrentBag<T> GetEnumerator performance #14835
    Future
  • Proposal: Dictionary with key and value in same object #18376
    Future
  • Add Move method to List<T> #19611
    Future
  • Micro-optimizing: Finding the middle of a given range #7520
    Future
  • Proposal: ImmutableDictionary.Create(TKey, TValue) #21559
    Future
  • API Proposal: Set-like operations over dictionaries #23244
    Future
  • Proposal: ReverseComparer #23263
    Future
  • ConcurrentDictionary: ApproximateCount #23278
    Future
  • Provide the way to control how HashSet<T> and Dictionary<T, V> grows #23519
    Future
  • Have HashSet<T> implement ICollection #23605
    Future
  • Add StructuralComparer<T> #23627
    Future
  • Improve performance of Immutable/SecureObjectPool/AllocFreeConcurrentStack #23686
    Future
  • List<T>: Improve InsertRange performance of lazy IEnumerable #9232
    Future
  • There should be an `ObservableDictionary<TKey, TVal>` in contrast to `ObservableCollection<T>`! #24510
    Future
  • Move, Reverse, etc. on LinkedList #25313
    Future
  • Idea for Dictionary<TKey, TValue> to make hash collisions be ordered by hashCode #9917
    Future
  • Proposal: ImmutableArray.UnsafeFreeze<T>(T[]) #25461
    Future
  • ConcurrentStack PushRange idea #25617
    Future
  • [Proposal] Use hash array mapped trie for ImmutableDictionary #26001
    Future
  • TryGetValue improvements #26685
    Future
  • LinkedList should provide find methods taking a predicate #27688
    Future
  • Add an ImmutableDictionary which has constant time lookups but is slow to update #27983
    Future
  • LINQ Merge Method for `IReadOnlyDictionary<TKey, TValue>` #28227
    Future
  • Proposal: Add an atomic ToArray + Clear method to ConcurrentDictionary<TKey, TValue> #28434
    Future
  • "The parameter is incorrect." System.Collections.ListDictionaryInternal #28653
    Future
  • Proposal: add Join overload that returns a valueTuple #28747
    Future
  • Stable BinarySearch overload #28857
    Future
  • Covariant Immutable Collections #28911
    Future
  • API for inserting a Span<T> into a List<T> efficiently #1530
    Future
  • Queue<T>.Enqueue and Stack<T>.Push are slower than List<T>.Add #29084
    Future
  • Creating ImmutableDictionary from an existing dictionary is very slow #29089
    Future
  • Add ConditionalWeakTable.TryAdd API #29368
    Future
  • String Dictionary with StringComparer.Ordinal slower than default EqualityComparer #29714
    Future
  • Ctor of sorted collection classes should support IReadOnlyDictionary or IEnumerable #29829
    Future
  • Consider adding Count to ImmutableArrayExtensions #30074
    Future
  • Performance Issue with List<> & Prepend #13079
    Future
  • Potential regression: Dictionary of Value Types #13137
    Future
  • CollectionExtensions.TryAdd doesn't provide atomic check-and-add on a ConcurrentDictionary #30451
    Future
  • Design choices between two ...OutOfRangeException #30617
    Future
  • Consider creating an IndexSet Type #30817
    Future
  • Enumerating ImmutableSortedSet<> is slower than index-based for loop #1044
    Future
  • Proposal: support reference semantics for IComparable<T>, IEquatable<T> #1755
    Future
  • List<T> RemoveAt to return the removed value #31827
    Future
  • HashSet<T>.UnionWith() vs ctor(Enumerable<T>) performance. #32285
    Future
  • Evaluate if BitArray() can be further optimized using single AddPairwise operation #38719
    Future
  • [Proposal] Add MoveNext(ref T current) to IEnumerator<T> #43081
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Attribute on Types to opt-out of default Serialization/Binding behavior when they implement Collection Interfaces #61354
  • MaxBy inconsistent results with tie-breaks #61317
    7.0.0
  • API diff for .NET 5 vs .NET 6 #61367
  • Array.Sort() can drop items if exception thrown mid-swap #61340
  • [Mono]: Random crash in interpreter when doing stackwalks as part of STW. #59054
    7.0.0
  • Azure Pipelines / runtime (Formatting windows x64) fails #61331
  • CertificateRequestChainTests tests may be subject to DST "fall back" spurious failures #61302
  • Sometimes enums are not blittable on Blazor WASM #61350
  • Regression in Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder in DotNet 6 RC2 #61202
  • Installed .NET 6.0 and RuntimeInformation.FrameworkDescription property is returning incorrect version. #61330
  • System.Text.Json 4.7.2 uses System.Buffers >= 4.5.1(4.0.3.0 dll version) but asks for System.Buffers, Version=4.0.2.0 #38782
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm][debugger] Correct the endian swapping and string implementation #61386
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Delete unused mono_unbox_int #61384
    community-contribution
  • TEST: sample asmdiffs report #61383
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Allow enums in unmanaged callbacks. #61377
  • Fix credscan bugs release/5.0 #61371
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net
  • Rewrite selection for fields and always normalize SIMD types in VN #61370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix -rebuild command #61366
    area-Infrastructure
  • Change WASM direct heap access to use helper functions #61355
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Move some Reflection call of Array ctor into managed #61347
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Completely lock-free ClassLoader::LookupTypeKey #61346
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Fix incorrect CCW decoding in GetObjectForCCW #61342
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 5.0.13
  • Support MULX returning ValueTuple #61336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • InstallWorkload: Use the repo's `nuget.config` as the base for installing manifests #60699
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix credscan bugs release/6.0 #61372
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] Fix for InformationalVersion #61240
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix dump generation issues for VS4Mac #61063
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • Delete unused test projects #61348
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [DllImportGenerator] Remove unnecessary DLLIMPORTGENERATOR_ENABLED ifdefs #61345
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • add unit test for variable length encoding HTTP/3 #60766
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Request CachePolicy isn't applied in HTTP request header #60913
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Start tracking debug info for inlined statements #61220
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Don't create a COM weak reference if the object is an aggregated COMWrappers RCW. #61283
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • Proper VNs for zeroed structs #61285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Only run source-index on main branch. #61271
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Fix incorrect CCW decoding in GetObjectForCCW #61341
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] Disable package validation in source-build for reliability #60881
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable a couple of pen tests on Windows on release/6.0 #60789
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-System.Drawing
  • [release/6.0] DotNetHost packages are not created during source-build #60577
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • SPMI: Use diffed bytes for jit-analyze and print more info #61254
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Revise descriptions of VS workloads, and add missing ones #60835
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60561
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.1
  • Add additional steps in gcc validation leg #61241
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #61376
  • Add System.Diagnostics.StackFrame.GetMethodFromNativeIP API for VS4Mac #61289
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Ensure MaxBy/MinBy return first element if all keys are null. #61364
    area-System.Linq, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Remove WasmBuildTemplate #61315
    area-Build-mono
  • Use UTC throughout X509Certificate request tests #61344
    area-System.Security, test enhancement, community-contribution
  • Provide PEM implementations for AsymmetricAlgorithm. #61284
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Convert concatenation string to interpolation for System.Private.Xml #60057
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [wasm][aot] Disable (again) `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn3.11.Tests` failing due to OOM #61323
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix binplacing for (impl) System.Security.Cryptography.Encoding.dll #61333
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Adding Regex source generator to Microsoft.netcore.app.ref pack #61329
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add instructions for using Codespaces #60996
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: extend redundant relop to handle side effects #61275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix format.py to use jit-format.exe, not jit-format.bat #61334
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/6.0.x] Add System.Diagnostics.StackFrame.GetMethodInfoFromNativeIP API for VS4Mac #61298
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0.1] add support for macOS 12 #61028
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.1
  • Baseline two failing tests to make outerloop green again #61280
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Run AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #59479
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • Optimize System.Diagnostics.TraceSource #60464
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Make WeakReferenceCollection thread safe #61054
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Create superpmi-asmdiffs pipeline #61194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1461871 #61274
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Explicitly mark tests with CLRTestKind=SharedLibrary #61235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix inconsistency in p/invoke arguments introduced when switching some to be blittable #61071
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] JIT: Enable CSE/hoisting for "arrayBase + elementOffset" #61293
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TEST ONLY] Test stress build refactor #61311
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluation of a static class attribute; using current namespace for evaluation #61252
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Pin Platform Manifest file to 6.0.0 Version of the file during servicing #61260
    area-Setup
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: slightly more aggressive tail duplication #61179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • XARCH: Remove redudant tests for GT_LT/GT_GE relops. #61152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add mono_class_get_special_jit_flags and MONO_SPECIAL_JIT_DEFER_CLASS_INIT_TO_CTOR #60987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Build improvements #61276
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.1
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • [mono][jit] Fix and optimize llvmonly+gsharedvt code generation #61117
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix: add missed open curly #61332
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0
  • Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #61187
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • [wasm] Add task marshaling tests. #61324
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: ensure properties are available when file is deleted. #60214
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Change OperIsBlkOp test to check for store block operators #60878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve trimmed-metadata exception message #1712

Closed

  • Detect infinite generic expansion #776
  • NativeAOT treat runtime-dependent values as constants #1711
  • System.Text.Json using source generators produces "Method not found" #1498
  • Add support for DynamicDependencyAttribute #346

PullRequests

Merged

  • Generate better warnings for generic recursion #1709
    area-NativeAOT
  • Improve failure mode of recursive generic lookups #1710
    area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support for more unary and binary ops #1705

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improove the overall stability of Hot Reloading by allowing us to declare sync points for the hot reload agent. #22520
  • .NET 6 breaks EF Core 2.2 #22519
  • Publishing trimmed console app prints a message which warns about trimming #22518
  • dotnet restore: support RestoreConfigFile from csproj or Directory.Build.props #22517
  • dotnet 3.1.414 installs on OSX, 3.1.415 does not install correctly #22516
  • Using Remove in Directory.Build.props is ignored #22515
  • EventWaitHandle.OpenExisting(String, EventWaitHandleRights) is no longer existed, but you documented? #22514

Closed

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main validation-sdk-.NET Core SDK 3.1.4xx, sdk, .NET Core SDK 3.1.4xx #sdk-117294-.NETCoreSDK3.1.4xx #22492
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main validation-sdk-.NET Core SDK 3.1.1xx, sdk, .NET Core SDK 3.1.1xx #sdk-117297-.NETCoreSDK3.1.1xx #22493
  • Shared OutputPath for whole solution is causing build failure #22438
    Discussion
  • Binaries for v3.1.415 unavailable #22504
  • The remote certificate is invalid according to the validation procedure: RemoteCertificateNameMismatch, RemoteCertificateChainErrors #21573
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #22524
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #22523
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #22522
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure references added using "Reference" are correctly copied in BlazorWASM projects #22470
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Blazor AOT Publish Tests #22477
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update build.yml #22361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22510
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • Champion: Name lookup for simple name when target type known #2926
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Explicit lambda return type #4934
    10.0
  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set
  • Champion "CallerArgumentExpression" #287
    10.0

PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • Update lambda-improvements.md to match language design decisions #5388

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BatchFixAllProvider crashes with "An element with the same key but a different value already exists" #57660
  • Missing test case for conditional access in `CheckValEscape` #57653
    Backlog
  • Can't Declare an Inferred Lambda With Optional Arguments #57652
  • Static fields of type pointer cannot be viewed in the Watch window #57651
  • IDE0059 Unnecessary assignment of a value to => CS0165 Use of unassigned local variable #57650
  • Roslyn fails to verify [NotNullWhen] contracts in methods returning Nullable<bool> #57649
    17.1
  • Visual Studio 2022 EnforceCodeStyleInBuild causes error to show twice #57647
    17.1
  • Intellisense not auto complete when writing code continously without enter #57646
  • `dotnet_sort_system_directives_first` does not generate error even if `IDE0055` severity is set to `error` #57644
  • Create new class is not being offered #57642

Closed

  • .NET 6.100 The call is ambiguous between the following methods or properties breaking change #57627
    17.1.P2
  • Windows Defender false positive causes CI failures #49519
    Next
  • Roslyn fails to process conditional flow annotations if there's explicit true / false comparison #42398
  • C# compiler, VS: Incorrect error "Operator '?' cannot be applied to operand of type 'TValue'" #57629
    17.1
  • Test process crash on Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.EditorFeatures.UnitTests.dll #55639
    17.1
  • Compiler cannot properly detect initialization of non-nullable fields with non-null values during object initialization #57645
  • NormalizeWhitespace() does not indent switch expression syntax properly #45651
    Compiler.Next
  • Feedback for new global usings feature #57599
    17.1
  • IOperation support for interpolated string handler conversions #54718
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a baseline to Inheritance Margin benchmark #57659
    Area-IDE
  • Remove CWT from skeleton caching and simplify impl #57658
    Area-IDE
  • use pair-wise testing on PR validation #57657
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix issues in compilation tracker reported in prior PR #57656
    Area-IDE
  • Cleanup how we create skeleton assemblies. #57655
    Area-IDE
  • Document that MyTaskMethodBuilder must be public #57654
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix race condition in computing _hostAnalyzerStateMap #57648
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.0
  • Avoid concurrent use of ConditionalWeakTable on net472 #57643
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Compare arrow expression clauses when they are children of properties or indexers #57624
    Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57641
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve error reporting around conditional access. #57640
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • proposed document pull diagnostics implementation #57518
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Overload resolution was ignoring HasTypeArgumentInferredFromFunctionType for calls in expanded form #57633
    Area-Compilers, 17.1.P2
  • Fix line delta calculation for top-level code #57556
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Telemetry improvements #57406
    Area-Interactive, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • adding draft of detailed spec #57346
    Area-IDE
  • Move hte dependent checksum computation directly into the CompilationTracker component #57632
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Interpolated string handlers in the CFG #57483
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Bump dependencies and version for GA #57573
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Tiny simplification to the compilation tracker. #57628
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57663
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57662
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57661
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Use helpers in param-nullchecking emit #57615
    Area-Compilers
  • Use MSBuildLocator for tests #57613
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make it possible to analyze the dataflow of `ConstructorInitializerSyntax ` #57576
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • When we're loading dependencies, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers
  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.7-vs-deps #57504
    Area-Infrastructure
  • reduce number of test legs we have to match a pairwise test approach #57586
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't throw when delay is expedited in tests #57631
    Area-IDE
  • Move the task completion source for a queue item into the queue item itself. #57617
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.9-vs-deps #57508
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Slice value is always assumed to be not null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Use the .NET 6.0 SDK for building #57637
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.11-vs-deps #57482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Document why we have -vs-deps branches #41153
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix C# language name in spec #57427
    Area-Compilers
  • Port BasicAddMissingReference.InvokeSomeFixesInVisualBasicThenVerifyReferences to the new test framework #57626
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Razor Source Generator question/follow-up regarding comment in .NET Conf session. #38238
    Discussions
  • VS2022 RC3 Blazor compiling files that have been excluded from the project #38234
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Serialize(Tuple.Create()) inconsistency between (debug/release) & published #38233
  • [Feature Request] SignalR response compression with new websockets compression in Asp.Net Core 6 #38230
  • After Updating to Visual Studio 2022 Current from Visual Studio 2022 Preview, Blazor project display error when debuggin #38229
  • Blazor UI not updated after field update in onclick #38228
  • Update .net 5 to 6: 'The path must be absolute' #38226
  • Startup regression: mvc #38224
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #38223
  • Perf improvement: mvc #38222
  • Port WebAssembly in .Net 6 RC2: The top level app must directly references to the assemblies used by it's referenced assemblies to 6.0.1xx #38220
    6.0.x
  • Upgrading app to .Net 6 Shows multiple app errors under browser console #38215
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.Extensions package dependent on prerelease package #38214
  • Unable to call StaticWebAssetsLoader.UseStaticWebAssets after upgrading to VS 2022 official release #38212
  • HttpResponseStreamWriter should override TextWriter.WriteLineAsync(string) #38210
  • Dashboard like Phoenix Liveview Dashboard for ASP.NET Core 7 #38207
  • RemoteJSRuntime uses SignalR global options instead of ComponentHub options #38205
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ASP.Net 6 Namespace issue #38204
  • Blazor Hot Reload only Works with dotnet watch, not from Visual Studio 2022 #38202
  • The group can be removed if there is none in the group in signalr? #38200
  • Startup improvement: https #38199
  • Startup regression: plaintext #38198
  • EPIC: SignalR - .NET7 #38196
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Default Blazor Wasm template does not run #38195
  • NullReferenceException coming from Razor compiler after upgrade of .NET SDK (without any change to .NET 5 project). #38194
    6.0.x

Closed

  • MSB6004 The specified task executable location "%ProgramFiles%\dotnet\dotnet.exe" is invalid on a brand new Blazor project #38232
  • Error when trying to use Quic with current .NET 6 RC #37971

  • BUG: <PageTitle> not works in WasmPrerender mode #38192
  • Startup improvement: connectionclose #38152
  • Blazor supporting an IEnumerable of RenderFragment as children #38206
  • navigator.clipboard.writeText blocked in Safari (MacOS and iOS) #38211
  • Virtualize component - Adding Span<T> support #38216

    7.0-preview1
  • Error in documentation #38201
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation 3.2.21 has broken dependencies on NuGet #38172
  • Vs2022 official version 17.0.0 asp.net core 6 MVC, unable to jump to the controller in the view #38197
  • Startup improvement: connectionclosehttps #37962
  • Startup improvement: mvc #38106
  • Hi @jojorgeluisrdz198. It looks like you just commented on a closed PR. The team will most probably miss it. If you'd like to bring something important up to their attention, consider filing a new issue and add enough details to build context. #38193
  • fail `dotnet watch run` CS0246 The type or namespace name 'App' could not be found #36985
    .NET 7 Planning

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] iOS will show nothing if it's newer than iOS 13, and there is no scene delegate #3326

  • [Bug] Android back button doesnt work on .NET MAUI app #3314
  • [Enhancement] List installed apps #3313

Closed

  • [Bug] Border not propagating bindings #3304
  • [Bug] Elements wrapped with Border inside of CollectionView don't render. #2693
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] `Layout.ChildAdded` Does Not Fire When a Child is Added to a `Layout` #3309
  • [Bug] Border's "GetVisualChildren" returns no child elements. #2689
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Bug] Can't I create Maui with vs2022 official version 17.0.0? #3308
  • [Bug] Issues while deploying MAUI start up app #1541

PullRequests

Created

  • Validate and Fix MAUI Navigation Pages against our legacy tests #3329
  • Added Repo statistics to the readme #3328

  • Update issue templates to use GitHub forms (beta) #3320

Merged

    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [workload] move SingleProject.targets to Microsoft.Maui.Sdk #3281
    area/setup 🪄
  • Add support for Border to have visual tree children #3291
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3307
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • WinUI3 Interop for share and file picker #3232
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Multi window close #3295
  • Remove usage of IsolatedStorage #2710
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
  • [Android] Fix mismatch date issue in DatePicker #3298
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Expand WeakEventManager to Support Delegate #3253

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Does .UseLazyLoadingProxies() not work in XUnitTests? #26597
  • EF Core 6 get notmapped/ignored members #26594
  • Subquery.Contains throws when the type of item is value type #26593
  • efcore6 produces wrong SELECT SQL when Where/OrderBy clauses are applied to Owned properties followed by .Take() #26592
  • Table and column arguments flipped for usage of RelationalStrings.DefaultValueXXX #26591
  • Query with n:m relation adds non-existent column #26590
  • Update C# Documentation to give unit testing examples #26589
  • dbscaffold creates reference error CS0120 in nameof() for InverseProperty in certain conditions #26588
  • InvalidOperationException "sequence contains no matching element" in TableReferenceExpression.get_Table #26587
  • filtered include generates invalid SQL with First() but not with ToList() #26585

Closed

  • Scaffolder throws error if junction table foreign key columns have identical names #26496
    6.0.1
  • Upgrade to 6.0: closing connection leaves SqlLite db file open #26580
  • EfCore incorrect SQL when altering column with type #26523
  • Entity temporary values not being generated client side by EF #26567

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26601

  • Register design-time LoggerFactory as Scoped #26460
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1

    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • Avoid NRE in ForeignKeyAttributeConvention #26520
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26600
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0.1] RevEng: Consider skip navigation names when generating identifier for members of class #26531
    Servicing-approved
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #26596

Updated
